Description: Classic look and feel in a modern design - the Valentine combines the innovation and playability Ernie Ball Music Man guitars are known for in a classic, familiar design. Featuring a Mississippi Swamp Ash slab body, two pickups (humbucker in neck & single coil in bridge position, inside a humbucker casing), 12dB “Push-Push” boost, roasted maple neck/fretboard, and locking tuning machines, the Valentine has become a classic in its own time. SPECIFICATIONS - Fretboard Inlay: Dot - Truss Rod: Dual Action, Body End Wheel Adjustment - Frets: 22 - Fretboard Radius: 12" - Neck Width @12th Fret: 52mm - Nut Material: Plastic - Nut Width: 42mm - Scale: 25.5" - Neck Attachment: 5 Bolt - Neck Material: Roasted Hard Maple - Tuning Machines: Locking - Hardware: Chrome - Bridge: Hardtail - Pickups: S/H - Switching: 3 Way - Controls: 1V w/ Active 9V Powered 12dB Push-Push Boost, 1T - Strings (Brand, Gauges): Ernie Ball Slinky .010-.046 Includes: Deluxe Sterling by Music Man Gig Bag The Guitar plays very well with fast action. The grain on the maple on the neck is really beautiful. Guitar is in excellent condition, professionally set up with 10 gauge strings, used for a recording project, has been played less than 10 hours, is still under warranty and unregistered. Serial number digitally obscured for privacy.
Title: Sterling Music Man James Valentine Guitar Maroon 5 Adam Black
